content:
# Factorio Agent Report

## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Electricity Generator at position (-9.5, -0.5)
Consists of:
- Offshore pump (position: -9.5, -0.5)
- Boiler (position: -6.0, 1.5) - currently out of fuel
- Steam engine (position: -1.5, 4.5) - working
- Connected with pipes between offshore pump and boiler (3 pipes) and boiler to steam engine (4 pipes)

### Iron Production Line at position (15.5, 70.5)
Consists of:
- Electric mining drill (position: 15.5, 70.5) extracting iron ore - chest full warning
- Wooden chest (position: 15.5, 72.5) for ore storage - contains 46 iron ore
- Inserter (position: 16.5, 72.5) moving ore from chest to furnace
- Stone furnace (position: 16.0, 74.0) smelting iron ore to plates - no ingredients warning
- Assembling machine 2 (position: 21.5, 74.5) set to produce iron gear wheels - missing iron plates
- Output inserter (position: 18.5, 74.5)
- Output chest (position: 19.5, 74.5) - empty

## ERROR TIPS

### Placement errors
- Cannot place entities on occupied tiles: Check tile availability before placing entities (attempted furnace placement at (19,74))
- Cannot place entities too far away: Move closer to target position before placing (max distance is 10 tiles) - occurred multiple times
- Failed to place next to existing entity: Adjust spacing or change reference position when using place_entity_next_to()

### Connection errors
- Transport belts cannot connect directly to furnaces: Always use inserters between belts and furnaces/assemblers
- Failed to connect power to inserters: Ensure proper electrical pole placement and connections

### Inventory management errors
- Attempting to extract items not in container: Verify container contents before extraction
- Full output chests stop production: Ensure output chests are emptied or add more storage
- Furnace has no ingredients despite available ore: Check inserter orientation and power supply

### Production optimization
- Mining drill stopped due to full chest: Add more furnaces or increase plate consumption
- Assembler missing resources: Verify input material supply chain is complete
- Manual resource transfers needed: Automate material flow with proper inserter setup

### Power management
- Boiler out of fuel: Maintain coal supply to power generation
- Inserters losing power: Check power network coverage and capacity
